CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( TEXT(Status__c) = "Approved", TEXT(Status__c) = "Active", TEXT(Status__c) = "Inactive" ), ( 5 * FLOOR( ( End_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) + MIN( 5, MOD( End_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - ( 5 * FLOOR( ( Start_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Start_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) + CASE( WEEKDAY(End_Date__c), 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, 1, 0 ),
0 )
CustomField.label: Days Taken
